page.title: 01Stepaside Post Office.
page.content: Mrs. Lewis is the post mistress at Stepaside Post Office. She has a very busy week with about 150 people calling to collect pensions and different kinds of insurances. The people come from Kilgetty to Amroth to Wiseman's Bridge. She told me, Daniel Wilde, when my friends and I visited her last week that she has no competition from the Post Office in Kilgetty. Mrs. Lewis has been working in the Office for 33 years and is undecided whether to stay on or not. A young person wearing a mask entered her shop about 4 weeks ago pointed a gun at her and tied her up at the kitchen stove. The police closed all roads to Pembrokeshire on that day but the robber got away. She gets her sweets and stickers from a wholesaler in Llanelli. The Post Office used to be a blacksmith's shop.
